title: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 Tour Championship
headline: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 Tour Championship
description: Michelle Wie on turning 25, Bubba Watson on why he'd never get a mental-game coach and Rory McIlroy on his problem hitting shots into spectators' pockets in our Top 10 Quotes of the Week.
